newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RCBC owners okay capital hike, stock rights.
newsitem.headline: RCBC owners okay capital hike, stock rights.

text.p: Stockholders of the Rizal Commercial Banking Corp (RCBC) had approved an increase in the bank's authorised capital stock to 8.0 billion pesos from 800 million pesos, corporate secretary Marcelo Dy said on Tuesday.
"Everything was approved by the stockholders," Dy told Reuters.
The bank presented during a special stockholders' meeting on Monday its plan to issue stock rights and an additional public offering to cover the capital increase.
It also planned to declare an 800 percent stock dividend and a 10-for-one stock split.
